description.value:
You conjure a loyal phantom watchdog.

Summoning Spell

  • You summon a medium undead called a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-summoned-creatures.Actor.uWKe1Hh0JkL6fhel]{Faithful Hound}. It is immune to damage, all conditions, and cannot be targeted.

  • You must specify a password when casting the spell. When a small or larger creature comes within 30 feet of the hound without first speaking the password, the hound starts barking loudly.

  • The hound has &reference[darkvision] and &reference[truesight] with a range of 120 ft. and a passive perception equal to your spell save DC.

  • The hound rolls its own initiative in combat. On its turns, it can move up to 30 ft. and then make a bite attack. After attacking, it teleports back to the location where you summoned it.

Melee Spell Attack

The hound's attack uses your spell attack bonus.

  • Hit: Target takes [[/damage 3d6 piercing]] damage.
